mapper.select: SELECT ID, CONTRACT_ID, STEP, CREATED_AT FROM contract_progress WHERE CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId} ORDER BY CREATED_AT DESC

SELECT cp.ID, cp.CONTRACT_ID, cp.STEP, cp.CREATED_AT, c.CONTRACT_TITLE AS contractTitle, c.DESIGNER_ID AS designerId, c.CLIENT_ID AS clientId FROM contract_progress cp JOIN contracts c ON cp.CONTRACT_ID = c.ID WHERE cp.CONTRACT_ID = #{contractId} ORDER BY cp.CREATED_AT DESC
mapper.update: MERGE INTO contract_progress t USING (SELECT #{contractId} AS contract_id FROM dual) src ON (t.contract_id = src.contract_id) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET t.step = #{step} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (id, contract_id, step, created_at) VALUES (seq_progress_id.NEXTVAL, #{contractId}, #{step}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT c.CONTRACT_ID AS contractId, c.CLIENT_ID AS clientId, c.DESIGNER_ID AS designerId, c.CONTRACT_TITLE AS contractTitle, c.DUE_DATE AS dueDate, cp.STEP AS step FROM contracts c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT contract_id, step FROM contract_progress WHERE (contract_id, created_at) IN ( SELECT contract_id, MAX(created_at) FROM contract_progress GROUP BY contract_id ) ) cp ON c.CONTRACT_ID = cp.contract_id WHERE c.CLIENT_ID = #{clientId}
